Posts.Content: gotkidsandcats wrote: I was diagnosed with stage iv ILC, bones mets, lymph nodes, er+/pr+/her-.  I have been taking arimedex for the past month.  Lately, the pain and discomfort on the breast with the tumor has been very painful and the lymph nodes under my left arm (tumor side) have also been very uncomfortable.  I have also started to feel swelling on my right underarm side which previously showed no signs of cancer. I know it takes arimdedex a few months to work, but should the pain be getting worse? Gotkidsandcats Dx 2/18/2011, ILC, 5cm, Stage IV, Grade 3, mets, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Continued Pain and Swelling during treatment gotkidsandcats gotkidsandcats
